titles.title: TARP Taxpayer Protection and Corporate Responsibility Act of 2009
TARP Taxpayer Protection and Corporate Responsibility Act of 2009
A bill to impose limitations on certain expenditures by participants in the Troubled Asset Relief Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
TARP Taxpayer Protection and Corporate Responsibility Act of 2009 - Prohibits any recipient of assistance under the Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) from sponsoring, hosting, or paying for entertainment or holiday events during the calendar year in which such assistance is received or the next occurring calendar year.
Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to waive such prohibition.
Subjects violations of this Act to civil penalties.
